amendment.description: To provide authorization for an Aviation Security Capital Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 898 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 898 proposed by Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S7790-7792; text: CR S7791) To provide authorization for an Aviation Security Capital Fund.
